title: Kalpitiya - Boutique Hotel for Sale
details:
This is an eco-friendly Boutique Hotel in Kalpitiya, located between the Kalpitiya lagoon and Palavi-alpitiya main road.

This 12 Acre property is located approximately 19Km from the Puttlam town & 138Km’s from Colombo.

For more details please contact. +94777407408 / +940777632672.
